Articles.Content:
This picture, posted by the KSP Twitter

https://twitter.com/KerbalSpaceP/status/406221700305395713/photo/1

I think this means Kerbal statues
If thats the case, what's the tall one with no distinct base?
It looks like a telescope.

I'll throw in my 2cents..

Looks like some form of customizable kerbals to me..
There's something about the silhouette of the strange one that seems kinda.. motorcyclish, to me. Kerbal pulling 'Easy Rider'.
I thought they looked like stickers.

There's something about the silhouette of the strange one that seems kinda.. motorcyclish, to me. Kerbal pulling 'Easy Rider'.

Agree. Looks like Jeb on a Harley.
Voidryder just read that thing on the bottom of your post. maybe its a reference?

I don't know why that one is so tall compared to the others, but it looks to me like a Kerbal with his helmet off. Plus I see what looks like a helmet silhouette at the bottom.

As for what these all are? Kerbal plastic figures!
ohhhh boy. Update? Action Figures?

Kerbal figurines?

If so...my daughter is going to have a very kerbal Christmas
OMG and I wont be able to play till sunday?!
Kerbal RPG?
I think the strange silhouette is a kerbal with a jetpack
^ That's what I'm thinking
The one on far right looks like a Kerbal in a hoodie. Or maybe it's pulled off hood of a HAZMAT suit?
Shut up and take my money
's his helmet I think. Or maybe a rocket.

Kerbal figurines?

With the roundy bases on all but one of the silouettes, that's what I'm thinking.
It looks like you will be able to use your kerbals created in kerbalizer in the game!
I think that's the Kerbal Village People. YKCA, baby!
It said today, but we all know, it doesn't mean today.
I'm really curious to know what is this.
Why would there be an update so soon? We just had an update not too long ago and if it is an update we can't really expect a lot from it.
Personally, I think they're Kerbal models/action figures, not ingame. Maybe?
